tiePointGrids.name: x_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Geolocated x (across track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

tiePointGrids.name: y_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Geolocated y (along track) coordinate of detector FOV centre

tiePointGrids.name: latitude_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Latitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

tiePointGrids.name: longitude_tx
tiePointGrids.description: Longitude of detector FOV centre on the earth's surface

bands.name: flags_an
bands.description: Fire test summary flags

bands.name: FRP_MWIR_an
bands.description: Fire radiative power computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1, depending on the used_channel) and associated with detected SWIR fires

bands.name: FRP_SWIR_an
bands.description: Fire radiative power computed from SWIR channels (S6 channel)

bands.name: FRP_uncertainty_SWIR_an
bands.description: Fire radiative power total uncertainty computed from SWIR channels

bands.name: IFOV_area_an
bands.description: Projected area of detector IFOV on surface

bands.name: Radiance_window_S6_an
bands.description: Average S6 background window radiance used in the FRP equation.

bands.name: Ratio_S56_an
bands.description: Ratio of the radiances measured in S5 and S6 indicating whether the AF pixel detection is likely to be from a vegetation fire or a gas flare (Values sup. or equal to to 0.9)

bands.name: S5_Fire_pixel_radiance_an
bands.description: S5 Fire pixel radiance

bands.name: S5_confirm_an
bands.description: This flag indicates if this fire has been detected using both S6 and S5 radiances (equal to 1) or only using S6 (value = 0)

bands.name: S6_Fire_pixel_radiance_an
bands.description: S6 Fire pixel radiance

bands.name: TCWV_an
bands.description: Total column water vapour above fire

bands.name: classification_an
bands.description: Hotspot classification code

bands.name: transmittance_SWIR_an
bands.description: Transmittance of path to fire computed from SWIR channels (S6 channel)

bands.name: used_channel_an
bands.description: Boolean flag indicating which channel was used in the FRP calculation, with 0 referring to S7 channel and 1 to F1 channel

bands.name: FRP_uncertainty_SWIR_bn
bands.description: Fire radiative power total uncertainty computed from SWIR channels (S6)

bands.name: IFOV_area_bn
bands.description: Projected area of detector IFOV on surface

bands.name: Radiance_window_S6_bn
bands.description: Average S6 background window radiance used in the FRP equation.

bands.name: Ratio_S56_bn
bands.description: Ratio of the radiances measured in S5 and S6 indicating whether the AF pixel detection is likely to be from a vegetation fire or a gas flare (Values sup. or equal to to 0.9)

bands.name: S5_Fire_pixel_radiance_bn
bands.description: S5 Fire pixel radiance

bands.name: S5_confirm_bn
bands.description: This flag indicates if this fire has been detected using both S6 and S5 radiances (equal to 1) or only using S6 (value = 0)

bands.name: S6_Fire_pixel_radiance_bn
bands.description: S6 Fire pixel radiance

bands.name: TCWV_bn
bands.description: Total column water vapour above fire

bands.name: classification_bn
bands.description: Hotspot classification code

bands.name: transmittance_SWIR_bn
bands.description: Transmittance of path to fire computed from SWIR channels (S6 channel)

bands.name: used_channel_bn
bands.description: Boolean flag indicating which channel was used in the FRP calculation, with 0 referring to S7 channel and 1 to F1 channel

bands.name: flags_in
bands.description: Fire test summary flags

bands.name: BT_MIR_in
bands.description: MIR Brightness Temperature from the fire

bands.name: BT_window_in
bands.description: Mean Brightness Temperature of the valid pixels in the background window

bands.name: Day_night_in
bands.description: Daytime or nighttime fire flag set to 1 in case of daytime(i.e. solar zenith angle .lt. 85 degree)

bands.name: F1_Fire_pixel_radiance_in
bands.description: Fire pixel radiance computed from F1 brightness Temperature

bands.name: FRP_MWIR_in
bands.description: Fire radiative power computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1)

bands.name: FRP_uncertainty_MWIR_in
bands.description: Fire radiative power total uncertainty computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1)

bands.name: Glint_angle_in
bands.description: Angle between SLSTR viewing direction and the direction of the sun rays specifically reflected from the horizontal surface

bands.name: IFOV_area_in
bands.description: Projected area of detector IFOV on surface

bands.name: Radiance_window_in
bands.description: Average background window radiance used in the FRP equation. This radiance is associated with the channel defined by the used_channel parameter

bands.name: S7_Fire_pixel_radiance_in
bands.description: Fire pixel radiance computed from S7 brightness Temperature

bands.name: Satellite_zenith_angle_in
bands.description: Satellite View Zenith angle

bands.name: Sun_zenith_angle_in
bands.description: Solar Zenith angle

bands.name: TCWV_in
bands.description: Total column water vapour above fire

bands.name: classification_in
bands.description: Hotspot classification code

bands.name: n_cloud_in
bands.description: Number of cloudy pixels in background window

bands.name: n_water_in
bands.description: Number of water pixels in background window

bands.name: n_window_in
bands.description: Background window size

bands.name: transmittance_MWIR_in
bands.description: Transmittance of path to fire computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1)

bands.name: used_channel_in
bands.description: Boolean flag indicating which channel was used in the FRP calculation, with 0 referring to S7 channel and 1 to F1 channel
